attributes.action: Save Middlecross Day Centre and Care Home Armley, Leeds
attributes.additional_details:
Middlecross day centre and care home provide a vital service for the elderly and needy in Armley and surrounding areas of Leeds. This proposed closure will effect thousands of people; residents, day care visitors and their families.

If you believe that this is a vital service then please add your name to this petition and take a stand.

Thank you.
